Body:
"""Test response format is used in GB API call."""
game_client.default_format = game_client.RESPONSE_FORMAT_XML
res = game_client.fetch(1)
assert isinstance(res, Response)
mock_requests_get.assert_called_once_with('http://www.giantbomb.com/api/game/1'
    , params={'api_key': 'fake_key', 'format': 'xml'}, headers={
    'User-Agent': 'Pybomb {}'.format(version)})
